name: Soldier's Adventure
description:
You have been sent into space for the exploration of mines. Nothing special, but something went wrong. Waking up in a white room in deep space in the middle of the pitch of silence. You have to be saved.

Third person shooter with HD graphics and stealth capabilities of passing. Find out, in the dark, will take you a long time.

Find 3 easter eggs. Unique system of achivements.
